about_the_game:
Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder where you fight for survival in turn-based battles, requiring strategic decision-making and resource management in a heavy gothic atmosphere set in the apocalyptic world of the acclaimed tabletop RPG Mörk Borg.

You are a wandering lost soul, caught in the depths of the dreaded Mountain's Penance, a dungeon-like prison of despair and horror, where a mysterious cult is conducting heinous rituals to summon a demonic entity that will bring about the world's end, known as Nightfall.

Key Features

  • One-Shot RPG with Roguelike Deckbuilding: Choose flawed and tormented characters, enhance their powers, and build your deck with each run. Combine powerful cards and abilities in countless ways to create deterministic and unpredictable effects, crafting a strategy that fits your playstyle in a modern RPG system.

  • A new fast-paced first-person Dungeon Crawler: Engage in thrilling and intense turn-based battles against a variety of challenging enemies, each requiring a unique approach to defeat.

  • Inspired by the Award-Winning Tabletop RPG Mörk Borg: Get ready for an immersive experience in an apocalyptic world filled with horrors and despair. Explore chilling and oppressive environments imbued with existential dread, moral ambiguity, and the visceral horror of a dark fantasy setting.

  • Grim Art Style: Unique and gory character art by the renowned artist Thiago Lehmann, featuring twisted cultists, undead abominations, and other unspeakable horrors.

  • An Unstable and Chaotic Dungeon: Every choice matters. Choose the next dungeon room. Face unexpected events, risk and reward scenarios, and reap the benefits of your decisions. Each run offers new challenges as different sigils break, making every playthrough unique.

  • Extensive Content: Discover and collect powerful items that enhance your abilities and open new strategic possibilities. Dive into this adventure with hundreds of cards, trinkets, and additional layers of customization.

The seal has broken. Defenses have fallen. Chaos is unleashed. The entity awakens, hungering for blood. Will you hide in the shadows, or embrace the dark powers to survive?

content_descriptors.notes: The game explores themes of existential horror, psychological torment, and moral ambiguity, with disturbing imagery and scenarios. It includes references to dark rituals within its dark fantasy setting. Players sensitive to these themes should be aware that the content is designed to create a deeply immersive and unsettling experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder that combines dungeon crawling with elements of the award-winning RPG, Mörk Borg. Embark on a dark journey, improve your character, and survive at all costs — or be consumed by the horrors lurking in the darkness.
